Closing his eyes, he lets the showerhead douse him as he runs his hands from his chest down to his thighs. As he opens his eyes, you pull back and hide so that he doesn't catch you. He dries off and then leans back against the countertop, playing with his cock and bending over to dry off his toes.  Then he sits down in the middle of the bathroom and proceeds to stroke one out right then and there, spreading his fingers around his cock as he uses his other hand to caress his own body. Cody can barely contain himself, reaching rock hard status in no time and busting a nut all over the bathroom floor as you duck around the corner, hoping he didn't see you watching him the whole time.Enjoy!
title: Secret Shower
